ygData.subject: RE: Re: [EverQuest] Playstation
ygData.msgSnippet: Well now we know where all the new development ideas have gone.... This kinda thing pisses me off. Like the legends server should be what everyone already pays
ygData.messageBody:
Well now we know where all the new development ideas have gone.... This kinda thing pisses me off. Like the legends server should be what everyone already pays for, and all the ideas and new development for this PS2 game is the kind of thing they should be doing to the current EQ and its paying subscribers. When is the last time you been to a GM event, or have seen a majot development to the story with new zones or changes in zones?

-rob
